item.description:
Very last minute golf event.
I booked two t times for tomorrow at noon. If you can make it, please RSVP as soon as possible as I will be confirming the count early tomorrow morning with the course.
I've never played here but I've heard its a nice course and there has been management changes over the last few years. $43 for 18, $16 for cart.
Hope to see you there,

Directions From their website: The Club, is very easy to get to from the highway. Take Route 128 to exit 20B. Turn onto route 1A south at the end of the exit ramp. At the light, take the right fork onto County Way. After two blocks, bear left onto McKay St. The Golf & Tennis Club is .25 miles on the right

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: BeverlyGolf&Tennis
